name: PRSC Test Facility
description:
This is a submission for the  GMTK Game Jam 2019.

You are a bot used to test weapons at a facility in the People's Republic of Space China. Due to the bad quality of the joints used to attach the weapons you can only get one shot before the weapon breaks away and you have to catch it again. Each weapon is only effective against one enemy.

LMB - shoot

RMB - boost

I didn't have time to color code the weapons so:

The long thing kills big ships

The sphere kills homing missiles

The third thing kills the other ships

The game i mostly unfinished because i forgot i am in a different time zone than the one used in the jam and i also had to travel.
